languages.text: "Процедура приветствия и сверки идентификационных кодов будет осуществлена после удовлетворения приоритетного запроса — сообщи, где благословенный Амарнат!" {n}Голос Паскаля лязгает сталью.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Процедура приветствия и сверки идентификационных кодов будет осуществлена после удовлетворения приоритетного запроса — сообщи, где благословенный Амарнат!" {n}Голос Паскаля лязгает сталью.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "The salutatory procedure will be performed, and the identification codes verified after the priority request has been executed — tell me where the blessed Amarnat is!" {n}Pasqal's voice clangs like steel.{/n}

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「あいさつの手続きに入りましょう。優先要求、識別コードの認証完了…恩寵受けしアマルナトの居場所を答えよ！」{n}パスカルの声が鋼のような金属音を響かせた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The salutatory procedure will be performed, and the identification codes verified after the priority request has been executed — tell me where the blessed Amarnat is!" {n}Pasqal's voice clangs like steel.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「あいさつの手続きに入りましょう。優先要求、識別コードの認証完了…恩寵受けしアマルナトの居場所を答えよ！」{n}パスカルの声が鋼のような金属音を響かせた。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “致意程序将执行。在首要请求执行完毕后，开始验证身份识别码。请告诉我蒙福者阿玛纳特在哪里！”{n}帕斯卡的声音像钢铁一样铿锵有力。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The salutatory procedure will be performed, and the identification codes verified after the priority request has been executed — tell me where the blessed Amarnat is!" {n}Pasqal's voice clangs like steel.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “致意程序将执行。在首要请求执行完毕后，开始验证身份识别码。请告诉我蒙福者阿玛纳特在哪里！”{n}帕斯卡的声音像钢铁一样铿锵有力。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Les salutations d'usage et la procédure de vérification des codes d'identification seront réalisées après l'exécution de la requête prioritaire : dites-moi où se trouve Amarnat le béni ! » {n}exige Pasqal, la voix aussi dure que de l'acier.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The salutatory procedure will be performed, and the identification codes verified after the priority request has been executed — tell me where the blessed Amarnat is!" {n}Pasqal's voice clangs like steel.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Les salutations d'usage et la procédure de vérification des codes d'identification seront réalisées après l'exécution de la requête prioritaire : dites-moi où se trouve Amarnat le béni ! » {n}exige Pasqal, la voix aussi dure que de l'acier.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Se realizará el procedimiento de saludo y se verificarán los códigos de identificación una vez solucionado el asunto de mayor prioridad: ¡dime dónde está Amarnat!». {n}La voz de Pasqal resuena como el acero.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The salutatory procedure will be performed, and the identification codes verified after the priority request has been executed — tell me where the blessed Amarnat is!" {n}Pasqal's voice clangs like steel.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Se realizará el procedimiento de saludo y se verificarán los códigos de identificación una vez solucionado el asunto de mayor prioridad: ¡dime dónde está Amarnat!». {n}La voz de Pasqal resuena como el acero.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Die Begrüßungsprozedur wird ausgeführt, und die ID-Codes werden bestätigt, sobald die priorisierte Anfrage ausgeführt wurde — sagt mir, wo der gesegnete Amarnat ist!" {n}Pasqals Stimme klingt wie Stahl.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The salutatory procedure will be performed, and the identification codes verified after the priority request has been executed — tell me where the blessed Amarnat is!" {n}Pasqal's voice clangs like steel.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Die Begrüßungsprozedur wird ausgeführt, und die ID-Codes werden bestätigt, sobald die priorisierte Anfrage ausgeführt wurde — sagt mir, wo der gesegnete Amarnat ist!" {n}Pasqals Stimme klingt wie Stahl.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Selamlama prosedürünün başlatılması ve kimlik saptama kodlarının doğrulanması işlemi, öncelikli talebin icra edilmesinin ardından gerçekleştirilecek... Şimdi bana kutsanmış Amarnat'ın yerini söyle!" {n}Pasqal'ın sesi, çelik gibi çınlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The salutatory procedure will be performed, and the identification codes verified after the priority request has been executed — tell me where the blessed Amarnat is!" {n}Pasqal's voice clangs like steel.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Selamlama prosedürünün başlatılması ve kimlik saptama kodlarının doğrulanması işlemi, öncelikli talebin icra edilmesinin ardından gerçekleştirilecek: Bana kutsanmış Amarnat'ın nerede olduğunu söyle!" {n}Pasqal'ın sesi çelik gibi çınlıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
